event.description: New Avalon settled
Grain Rebellion
Covenant of New Avalon ratified, Jason Hasek voted first Prime Minister
Second Covenant of New Avalon ratified, Sandra Lockhart voted first Prime Minister-for-life
Free Worlds League formed
First New Avalon-built freighter dedicated
Terran Hegemony formed
Crucis Pact signed, Lucien Davion named first president of Federated Suns
Draconis Combine formed; Department of Military Intelligence formed
Lucien Davion retires, Charles Davion named president, Lucien Davion dies
Charles Davion dies, Reynard Davion named president
Lyran Commonwealth formed
Acala Pact signed
Almach Accord signed
Capellan Confederation formed
Reynard Davion dies, Etien Davion named president
Board of Magistrates formed
Etien Davion commits suicide, Paul Davion named president
Paul Davion dies, Marie Davion named president
Age of War begins
Novaya Zemlya incident
Marie Davion dies, Edmund Davion named president
Ares Conventions signed
Edmund Davion dies, Edward Davion named president
November Conspiracy begins, Edward Davion assassinated, Simon Davion named president; Principalities formed
Simon Davion named first Prince of the Federated Suns
Federated Suns gains plans for BattleMechs, Simon Davion dies, James Davion named Prince
James Davion assassinated, Ellen Davion named Princess
Act of Succession passed
Ellen Davion retires, William Davion named Prince
Ellen Davion dies
William Davion dies, Alexander Davion named Prince; Cassandra Varnay, David Varnay, Nikolai Rostov, Laura Davion, and Carmen Davion named Regents
Treason Trials begin
Treason Trials end
Davion Civil War begins
Davion Civil War ends, Principalities disbanded
New Avalon Accords signed
Star League formed
Reunification War begins
Reunification War ends
Alexander Davion dies, Zane Davion named Prince
Zane Davion dies, Sarah Davion named Prince
Sarah Davion dies, Samuel Davion named Princess
Samuel Davion dies, Roger Davion named Prince
Roger Davion dies, Joseph Davion named Prince
War of Davion Succession begins
War of Davion Succession ends, Joseph Davion dies in combat, Richard Davion named Prince
Preparedness Act passed
Richard Davion dies, John Davion named Prince
Simon Cameron dies
Border War begins
Border War ends, Executive Order 156 issued
Amaris coup
Star League disbanded
Operation Exodus takes place
Towne Debacle
First Succession War begins
War Zone Actions become law
Kentares IV Massacre
John Davion assassinated, Paul Davion named Prince
Reformation begins; Ministry of Information, Intelligence, and Operations formed
Reformation ends
First Succession War ends
Thomas Halder-Davion appointed Field Marshal
Colonel Damien Hasek named Duke of New Syrtis
Second Succession War begins
Paul Davion dies
Michael Davion named Prince
Prime Marshal Peter Davion refuses to lead rebellion
Marathon Offensive begins
St. Ives Raid takes place
Second Succession War ends
Third Succession War begins, Operation Pendragon begins
Cutthroat Fiasco
Michael Davion dies, Carl Davion named Prince
Carl Davion dies in combat, Melissa Davion named Princess, Reformation of Federated Suns military takes place
Melissa Davion dies, Joseph Davion II named Prince
Armistice of Van Diemen IV signed
Joseph Davion II abdicates, Peter Davion II named Prince
Joseph Davion II dies
Great Lee Turkey Shoot, Warrior's Cabal formed
Peter Davion II assassinated, Andrew Davion named Prince
Andrew Davion dies, Ian Davion named Prince
Michael Hasek marries Marie Davion-St. Claire
Ian Davion killed, Hanse Davion named Prince, Michael Hasek-Davion named Duke of New Syrtis
New Avalon Institute of Science formed
McCarron's War begins, Federated-Commonwealth Alliance Document signed
McCarron's War ends, Third Succession War ends
Operation Galahad 3026 takes place
Operation Galahad 3027 takes place
Hanse Davion marries Melissa Steiner, Fourth Succession War begins, Federated-Commonwealth unofficially formed
St. Ives Compact formed, Tikonov Free Republic formed, Michael Hasek-Davion killed, Federated Suns interdicted by ComStar
Fourth Succession War ends, Sarna March created
Tikonov Free Republic absorbed
Free Rasalhague Republic formed, Skye Crisis
War of 3039 begins
War of 3039 ends
Armed Forces of the Federated Commonwealth created
Clans invade the Inner Sphere
Battle of Tukayyid, Hanse Davion dies
Melissa Steiner Davion assassinated
Ryan Steiner assassinated, Federated Commonwealth officially formed, Archon-Prince Victor Steiner-Davion takes command of Federated Commonwealth
Lyran Alliance formed, Capellan Confederation and Free Worlds League invade Federated Commonwealth
Invasion of Coventry
